data.description: A collection of courses, tutorials, workshops, boot camps, exercises, and tech news sources for software developers.
data.author: Benjamin Scholtz

posts.content:
Course and Tutorials

W3Schools Online Web Tutorials

A comprehensive platform offering free tutorials, references, and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python.

Learn X in Y Minutes: Scientific Programming Language Tours

Quickly learn syntax and concepts of various. Take a tour of your next favorite language.

Sololearn: Learn to Code

Join Now to learn the basics or advance your existing skills

freeCodeCamp.org

Learn to Code - For Free

Microsoft Learn: Build skills that open doors in your career

Gain technical skills through documentation and training

Workshops and Bootcamps

Coding Workshops for Women

SheCodes teaches coding skills to women.

Exercises

Exercism

Learn, practice and get world-class mentoring in over 70 languages

Codecademy

Join the millions learning to code with Codecademy for free

Codewars - Achieve mastery through coding practice and developer mentorship

A coding practice website for all programming levels - Join Now

Tech News

Hacker News

Everything computer science and entrepreneurship

data.title: Community-Driven Mentorship Programme
data.description: The Mentorship List is a community-driven effort built on top of "The Ultimate Developer Mentoring Guide"
data.author: Benjamin Scholtz

posts.content:
The Mentor List is a community-driven effort built on top of "The Ultimate Developer Mentoring Guide" that connects those seeking mentorship with willing mentors. Mentors can submit a PR to add themselves to the list in the mentors.json file, and mentees are responsible for reaching out to a mentor they feel is the best fit. Many of the mentors hang out in the ZATech Slack #mentoring channel.

Are you keen for mentorship? Check out the How to Find a Mentor page.

Are you a willing mentor? Check out the How to Become a Mentor page.
